member.summary: Static methods for handling audio files

member.summary: Returns an array of all audio file extensions

member.name: M:Chase.FFmpeg.Extra.FFAudioUtility.HasAudioExtension(System.String)

member.summary: Gets all files with audio extension in specified directory
